actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 818.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Carol Jeffery Toliver; Norman Lee Toliver; Marvin Lewis Toliver; Catherine Amelia Henderson; Ruth Louise Toliver; Mary Etta Samuel; Phyllis Jean Pelham; Alvin Windell Toliver; Grace Ann Toliver.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay a gratuity to nine brothers and sisters of a deceased Senate employee.

titles.title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Carol Jeffery Toliver; Norman Lee Toliver; Marvin Lewis Toliver; Catherine Amelia Henderson; Ruth Louise Toliver; Mary Etta Samuel; Phyllis Jean Pelham; Alvin Windell Toliver; Grace Ann Toliver.
